original: saṃjñāviparyāsaḥ katamaḥ? yo 'nitye nityam iti* duḥkhe sukham iti* aśucau śucīty anātmany ātmeti saṃjñāpa rikalpāḥ.
analyzed: saṃjñā viparyāsaḥ katamaḥ yaḥ anitye nityam iti duḥkhe sukham iti aśucau śuci iti anātmani ātmā iti saṃjñā pa rikalpāḥ

original: dṛṣṭiviparyāsaḥ* katamaḥ<'> yat tatraiva tathā saṃjñāparikalpite* kṣāntī rucir vyavasthāpanābhiniveśaḥ.
analyzed: dṛṣṭi viparyāsaḥ katamaḥ yat tatra eva tathā saṃjñā parikalpite kṣāntiḥ ruciḥ vyavasthāpana abhiniveśaḥ

original: cittaviparyāsaḥ katamaḥ<'> yat tatraiva tathābhiniviste rāgā<di> saṃkleśaḥ.
analyzed: citta viparyāsaḥ katamaḥ yat tatra eva tathā abhiniviste rāga ādi saṃkleśaḥ
tatra kleśāḥ tribhiḥ ākāraiḥ veditavyāḥ

original: asti kleśo viparyāsamūlam, asti viparyāsaḥ<,> asti viparyāsaniṣyandaḥ.
analyzed: asti kleśaḥ viparyāsa mūlam asti viparyāsaḥ asti viparyāsa nisyandaḥ
tatra viparyāsa mūlam a vidyā

original: viparyā sāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭir anta grāhadṛṣṭer ekadeśo dṛṣṭiparāmarśaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo rāgaś ca<.>
analyzed: viparyā sāḥ sat kāya dṛṣṭiḥ anta grāha dṛṣṭeḥ eka deśaḥ dṛṣṭi parāmarśaḥ śīla vrata parāmarśaḥ rāgaḥ ca

original: viparyāsaniṣyando* mithyādṛṣṭir antagrāhadṛṣṭer ekadeśo* pratigho māno vicikitsā ca<.>[76]
analyzed: viparyāsa nisyandaḥ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ anta grāha dṛṣṭeḥ pratighaḥ mānaḥ vicikitsā
tatra sat kāya dṛṣṭiḥ anātmani ātmā iti viparyāsaḥ
anta grāha dṛṣṭeḥ eka deśaḥ anitye nityam iti viparyāsaḥ
dṛṣṭi parāmarśaḥ aśucau śuci iti viparyāsaḥ
śīla vrate parāmarśaḥ duḥkhe sukham iti viparyāsaḥ

original: rāga ubhayathā<:> apy aśucau śucīti viparyāsaḥ<.> api duḥkhe sukham iti viparyāsaḥ.
analyzed: rāgaḥ ubhayathā api aśucau śuci iti viparyāsaḥ api duḥkhe sukham iti viparyāsaḥ
kleśānām paryāyaḥ katamaḥ

original: bahavaḥ paryāyāḥ<:> tadyathā saṃyojanāni bandhanāny anuśayā upakleśāḥ paryavasthānāny* oghā yogā upādānā granthā nīvaraṇāḥ khilā malā nighā<ḥ> śalyā<ḥ> kiṃcanā mūlā duścaritāni ca āsravā vighā<ḥ>tāḥ paridāhā upāyāsā raṇā agnayo jvarā vanasā vinibandhaś ceti<.> ity evambhāgīyāḥ* kleśaparyāyāḥ.
analyzed: bahavaḥ paryāyāḥ tat yathā saṃyojanāni bandhanāni anuśayāḥ upakleśāḥ paryavasthānāni oghāḥ yogāḥ upādānāḥ granthāḥ nīvaraṇāḥ khilāḥ malāḥ nighāḥ śalyāḥ kiṃcanāḥ mūlāḥ duścaritāni ca āsravāḥ vighāḥtāḥ paridāhāḥ upāyāsāḥ raṇāḥ agnayaḥ jvarāḥ vanasāḥ vinibandhaḥ ca iti iti evambhāgīyāḥ kleśa paryāyāḥ
tatra duḥkha samyojānāt saṃyojanāni
kuśala caryāyām a kāmakāri tvāt
viparyāsaiḥ citta upakleśaka tvāt upakleśāḥ
abhīkṣṇa samudācāri tvāt paryavasthānāni
durgādhatrvāt a anuśrotaḥ apahāri tvāt ca oghāḥ
mithyā pratipatti upāya tvāt yogāḥ
ātma bhāva prabandha upadāyaka tvāt upādānāḥ
durvimocana trvāt granthāḥ
tattva artha avacchādaka tvāt nivaraṇāḥ
kuśala sasya akṣetra bhūta tvāt khilāḥ
svabhāva saṃkliṣṭa tvāt malāḥ
nitya ghāta tvāt nighāḥ
a praśānta lakṣaṇa tvāt dūra anugata tvāt ca śalyāḥ
upadhi parigraha kāraka tvāt kiṃcanāḥ
akuśala āśraya bhūta tvāt mūaḍhāḥ
mithyā pratipatti svap nāva tvāt duścaritāḥ
citta vikṣepaka tvāt āsravāḥ
bhogaiḥ ātrpti karaka tvāt vighātāḥ
icchā vighāta karaka tvāt paridāhāḥ
vipatti āvāhaka tvāt
kalaha bhāṇḍana vigraha vidāha hetu bhūta tvāt
upacita upacitasya kuśala mūla indhānasya dāhaka tvāt agnayaḥ
mahā vyādhi bhūta tvāt jvaraḥ
vicitra ātma bhāva vṛkṣa saṃhāraka tvāt vā nasāḥ kāma guṇa śaktika
ca
loka uttara dharma prapti antarāya kara tvāt vinibandhāḥ
ete sarva kleśānām paryāyāḥ

original: prādhānyāt tu bhagavatā tasmiṃs tasmin paryāye te kleśāḥ sthāpitāḥ.
analyzed: prādhānyāt tu bhagavatā tasmin tasmin paryāye te kleśāḥ sthāpitāḥ

original: saṃyojanānīti nava saṃyojanāny nunayasaṃyojanam vistareṇa pūrvavat.
analyzed: saṃyojanāni iti nava saṃyojanāni nunaya saṃyojanam vistareṇa pūrvavat
bandhanāni iti trīṇi bandhanāni rāga dveṣa mohāḥ

original: anuśayā iti sapta nuśayāḥ kāmarāgānuśayo vistareṇa pūrvavat.
analyzed: anuśayāḥ iti sapta nuśayāḥ kāma rāga anuśayaḥ vistareṇa pūrvavat
upakleśāḥ iti trayaḥ upakleśāḥ rāga dveṣa mohāḥ

original: paryavasthānānīty aṣṭau paryavasthānāni ahrīkyam anapatrāpyam styāna
analyzed: paryavasthānāni iti aṣṭau paryavasthānāni ahrīkyam an apatrāpyam styāna
middham auddhatyam kaukṛtyam īrṣyā

original: oghā iti catvāra oghāḥ: kā<mau>gho bhavaugho <dr>styogho* 'vidyaughaś ca<.>
analyzed: oghāḥ iti catvāraḥ oghāḥ kāma oghaḥ bhava oghaḥ drstya oghaḥ avidyā oghaḥ ca
yathā oghāḥ evam yogāḥ
upādānāni iti catvāri upādānāni dṛṣṭi upādānam
śīla vrata upādānam ātma vāda upādānam

original: granthā iti catvāro granthāḥ<:> abhidhyākāyagrantho vyāpāda<ḥ> śīlavrataparāmarśa idam-satyābhiniveśaparāmarśa<ḥ> kāyagranthāḥ<.>
analyzed: granthāḥ iti catvāraḥ granthāḥ abhidhyā kāya granthaḥ vyāpādaḥ śīla vrata parāmarśaḥ idam satya abhiniveśa parāmarśaḥ kāya granthāḥ
nivaraṇāni iti pañca nivaraṇāni kāmacchanda nivaraṇam vyāpāda styānam iddhaitiddhatya kaukṛtya vicikitsā nivaraṇam
khilāni iti trīṇi khilāni rāga dveṣa mohāḥ

original: yathā khilāny evaṃ [l] malā [m] nighāḥ [n] śalyā<ḥ> <46B.3> [o] kiṃcanā [q] duścaritāni ca.
analyzed: yathā khilāni evam malāḥ nighāḥ n śalyāḥ o kiṃcanā duścaritāni ca

original: mūlānīti trīṇi mūlāni<:> lobho* 'kuśalamūlaṃ dveṣo moho 'kuśalamūlam<.>
analyzed: mūlāni iti trīṇi mūlāni lobhaḥ akuśala mūlam dveṣaḥ mohaḥ akuśala mūlam

original: āsravā iti traya āsravāḥ: kāmāsravo bhavāsravo 'vidyāsravaḥ.
analyzed: āsravāḥ iti trayaḥ āsravāḥ kāma āsravaḥ bhava āsravaḥ avidyā āsravaḥ

original: vighātā iti trayo vighātāḥ<:> rāgadveṣamohāḥ<:> yathā vighātā evaṃ [t] paridāhā*
analyzed: vighātāḥ iti trayaḥ vighātāḥ rāga dveṣa mohāḥ yathā vighātāḥ evam paridāhā
agnayaḥ x jvarāḥ

original: vinibandha iti pañca vinibandhaḥ: kāyāpekṣā kāmāpekṣā saṃsṛṣṭavi<46B.4>hāritā*
analyzed: vinibandhaḥ iti pañca vinibandhaḥ kāya apekṣā kāma apekṣā
ānulomika kathā vaikalyam alpa avara mātra saṃtuṣṭiḥ
kleśānām ādīnavah katamah
aneka ākāraḥ ādīnavaḥ veditavyaḥ tat yathā

original: kleśa utpadyamāna ādita eva cittaṃ saṃkleśayati.
analyzed: kleśaḥ utpadyamānaḥ āditas eva cittam saṃkleśayati
ālambane viparyāsam karoti
anuśayam dṛḍhīkaroti
naisyandikīm saṃskāra saṃtatim pravartayati
ātma vyābādhāya saṃvartate para vyābādhāya ubhaya vyābādhāya
dṛṣṭa dhārmikam avadyam prasavati sāṃparāyikam dṛṣṭadharma sāṃparāyikam
tad jam caitasikam duhkha daurmanasyam pratisaṃvedayate
janma ādikam duhkham nirvartayati
nirvāṇāt dūrīkaroti saṃtatim
kuśalebhyaḥ dharmebhyaḥ parihāpayati
bhogāyānim nigacchati
maṅkuḥ an udāgraḥ a viśāradaḥ parṣadam upasaṃkrāmati
diś vidikṣu pāpakaḥ avarṇaḥ akīrti śabda ślokaḥ
garhyaḥ bhāvati sātām
vipratisārī kālam karoti
kāyasya ca bhedāt apāya durgatī vinipātam narakesu upapadyate
svakam ca artham na anuprāpnoti
